main event: A UFO sighting was reported on September 9, 1960, in Fargo, North Dakota.
interesting points: The object was the size of a dime and oval in shape,It remained stationary before suddenly accelerating and disappearing,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The object was witnessed by numerous individuals in the Fargo and Grand Forks areas,The report suggests that the sighting may have been an unusually large meteor or similar astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: numerous individuals in the Fargo and Grand Forks areas
